session_start.description: Initializes UCM session, loads context and memory

session_stop.description: Closes UCM session, archives final state

pre_task.description: Injects UCM memory context before task execution

post_task.description: Archives task results and updates UCM memory

preservation: All existing hooks preserved, UCM hooks added to chain
handoff_note: UCM hooks successfully configured in Claude Code settings.json. All triggers use correct hook names (SessionStart not Start). Existing hooks preserved in chain.
